trans-unit.source: Explains how to start a manual, on-demand backup job.
trans-unit.target: Explains how to start a manual, on-demand backup job.

trans-unit.source: On the Devices page, go to the Backup Policies tab.
trans-unit.target: On the Devices page, go to the Backup Policies tab.

trans-unit.source: This tab lists all the backup policies in a tabular format, including the policy for the volume that you want to back up.
trans-unit.target: This tab lists all the backup policies in a tabular format, including the policy for the volume that you want to back up.

trans-unit.source: Select the policy by clicking anywhere in the corresponding row except for the first column.
trans-unit.target: Select the policy by clicking anywhere in the corresponding row except for the first column.

trans-unit.source: At the bottom of the page, click Take backup.
trans-unit.target: At the bottom of the page, click Take backup.

trans-unit.source: The button will expand to show the backup options: local snapshot and cloud snapshot.
trans-unit.target: The button will expand to show the backup options: local snapshot and cloud snapshot.

trans-unit.source: When you choose either of these options, you will be prompted for confirmation.
trans-unit.target: When you choose either of these options, you will be prompted for confirmation.

trans-unit.source: This will start a job to create a snapshot.
trans-unit.target: This will start a job to create a snapshot.

trans-unit.source: You will see a notification at the bottom of the page after the job is successfully created.
trans-unit.target: You will see a notification at the bottom of the page after the job is successfully created.

trans-unit.source: To monitor the job, click View Job in the notification area (at the bottom of the page).
trans-unit.target: To monitor the job, click View Job in the notification area (at the bottom of the page).

trans-unit.source: After the backup job is finished, go to the Backup catalog tab.
trans-unit.target: After the backup job is finished, go to the Backup catalog tab.

trans-unit.source: Set the filter selections to the appropriate device, backup policy, and time range.
trans-unit.target: Set the filter selections to the appropriate device, backup policy, and time range.

trans-unit.source: Click the check icon <linkText>check icon</linkText> after setting the filters.
trans-unit.target: Click the check icon <linkText>check icon</linkText> after setting the filters.

trans-unit.source: The backup should appear in the list of backup sets that is displayed in the catalog.
trans-unit.target: The backup should appear in the list of backup sets that is displayed in the catalog.
